body:
"Have you never had sex education at pokemon school before?"
"We don't learn those things..."
LMAO XD

I can only guess that it has something to do with the anime. Although, I'm pretty sure her mom is an anime-original character in the first place... At least, in this style she is. Her family in the game looks nothing like her after all. :p
For some reason there is a large influx of translated Lana doujin involving her mother.I'm not conplaining but why is it happening so suddenly?
